name: Affinity
description: Affinity is an ad tech company which creates user engagement products for digital marketers and media companies. We discover unique media placements, create new ad formats, build software, and get advertising budgets to drive branding and performance outcomes for marketers. We call ourselves the ‘Columbus of new media’. We operate 5 business units – Veve, SitePlug, mCanvas, Yield Solutions & AdOpsOne. These businesses operate in US, UK, EU, India, Indonesia and China.
